title: Tax Increment Financing and Procurement Laws in Public Agencies
summary: The newsletter discusses the impact of Tax Increment Financing (TIF) on local governments, highlighting its benefits for sponsors but potential harm to fire districts. It also covers new procurement laws affecting small works projects and their implications for fire departments.
compressed_content: Understanding the impact of Tax Increment Financing (TIF) on local governments. The benefits and potential risks to fire districts under TIF. New procurement laws for small works projects affecting fire departments.
search_text: Volume 20, Number 11: Tax Increment Financing Statute, Responsible Bidder Column, Small Works Procurement Process, Public Agencies, Fire Districts, Tax Impact Analysis
